links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Douglas Livingstone''' ([[1934]]) is an English actor. He voiced the part of [[Gimli]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' 1981 radio series]] broadcasted on [[BBC|BBC 4]].
